All Classes

Class Description
AmbientLight
Class for the lighting setting that illuminates the scene
BasicRayTracer
finds intersections between the ray and the scene, and calculates the color of the closest intersection
Camera
class to represent the camera.
Camera.CameraBuilder
Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Camera), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
CameraRayIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Class that tests the integration of rays coming out of a camera and their intersection with the view-plane and the geometric shapes
CameraTests
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
class cylinder which adds height to tube
CylinderTests
Unit tests for geometries.Cylinder class
DirectionalLight
A class that represents light that comes from very far away (like the sun), we have no meaning to distance in this case because it is always infinite, there is meaning only to the direction of light
Geometries
New class of Geometries for a set of geometric bodies.
GeometriesTests  
Geometry
interface for any geometric object
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
Unit tests for renderer.imageWrite class
Intersectable
Since our model will be based on scanning rays, we would like to define in all geometric shapes an action that will receive a Ray and return points of intersection with the geometry
Intersectable.GeoPoint
Since we calculate for each point its color regarding to the color of the shape itself, we would like to save each point of intersection along with the shape it cuts, so we built a static internal help class (in the form of PDS - Passive Data Structure)
Light
A class that represents all the lighting sources that all have intensity
LightSource
An interface that unifies all light sources, because for all of them we need a function that calculates the intensity of light according to a point and in addition we need a function to calculate the direction vector for the point.
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
class for the representation of the material from which the shapes are made
Plane
class that represents a plane in 3d
PlaneTests
Unit tests for geometries.Plane class
Point3D
basic geometric object for 3D point
Point3DTests
Unit tests for primitives.Point3D class
PointLight
A class representing a point light source that illuminates around it in a spherical shape
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
Ray
The set of points on a straight line that are on one side relative to a given point
RayTest
test to check getClosestPoint functions in RAY class
RayTests
Unit tests for primitives.Ray class
RayTraceBase
Abstract class to find the intersections of ray with the scene
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
Class which create the color matrix of the image from the scene
Render.RenderBuilder
Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Render), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
A class that represents the scene, that is, the positions of the shapes in 3D, and the background lighting
Scene.SceneBuilder
Builder Pattern, by this class we are updating the parent class (Scene), instance that we are interested in creating even before we create it
ShadowTests  
Sphere
class to represent a sphere in 3D
SphereTests
Unit tests for geometries.Sphere class
SpotLight
A class representing a spot light source that illuminates around it in a half-spherical shape
Triangle
class that represents triangle in 3D
TriangleTests
Unit tests for geometries.Triangle class
Tube
class that represents a tube in 3D
TubeTests
Unit tests for geometries.Tube class
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
A basic object in geometry with direction and size, defined by the end point (when the starting point - the beginning of the axes).
VectorTests
Unit tests for primitives.Vector class
